section.title: ORA-01658: unable to create INITIAL extent for segment in tablespace
section.subtitle: ORA-39171: Job is experiencing a resumable wait.
section.screen: ORA-39171: Job is experiencing a resumable wait. ORA-01658: unable to create INITIAL extent for segment in tablespace FINANCE
section.para: 解决方法 MAXSIZE 改为 UNLIMITED
section.screen: ALTER DATABASE DATAFILE '/opt/oracle/oradata/orcl/finance.dbf' AUTOEXTEND ON NEXT 5M MAXSIZE UNLIMITED
